Package booking.dao

Class ReservationDAO

java.lang.Object
booking.dao.ReservationDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericDAO<Reservation>
public class ReservationDAO extends Object implements GenericDAO<Reservation>
ReservationDAO implements GenericDAO as an abstraction between the Hotel Class and database operations
Version:
1.0
Author:
Brandon Brenes
